General.Name: Capital Metals PLC
General.Description: Capital Metals plc engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral sand resources in Sri Lanka and internationally. It holds interests in the Eastern Minerals project located in the Ampara District of the Eastern Province of Sri Lanka, as well as owns two mineral exploration licenses and two industrial mining licenses in Sri Lanka. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 15 Ingestre Place, London, United Kingdom, W1F 0DU
